text:
The eclipse.classpath file in branches/rel-2-2 had one error: one entry had two
"kind" attributes, so eclipse rejected it.  It also included the protocol/mail
and protocol/jms folders, which depend on optional jars and so should not be
included per the eclipse.readme file.  Revised version attached.

The class exclusions are no longer needed, as I have added some Geronimo jars 
to define the APIs at compile time.
creator: sebb@apache.org
